properties.areaDesc: Coastal Waters from Stake Island LA to Southwest Pass of the Mississippi River from 20 to 60 nm; Coastal waters from Southwest Pass of the Mississippi River to Port Fourchon Louisiana from 20 to 60 NM; Coastal waters from Pascagoula Mississippi to Stake Island Louisiana out 20 to 60 NM
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 10 at 3:44AM CST until February 10 at 6:00AM CST by NWS New Orleans LA
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Dense Fog Advisory, dense fog will reduce
visibility to 1 NM or less. For the Small Craft Advisory, seas
5 to 7 ft.

* WHERE...Coastal waters from Southwest Pass of the Mississippi
River to Port Fourchon Louisiana from 20 to 60 NM, Coastal
Waters from Stake Island LA to Southwest Pass of the
Mississippi River from 20 to 60 nm and Coastal waters from
Pascagoula Mississippi to Stake Island Louisiana out 20 to 60
NM.

* WHEN...For the Dense Fog Advisory, from 6 PM this evening to 9
AM CST Tuesday. For the Small Craft Advisory, until 6 AM CST
early this morning.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

If you must navigate, proceed with caution. Use proper fog
signals. Make sure all running lights are on. Remember to use
your radar and compass.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM CST EARLY THIS MORNING... ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 9 AM CST TUESDAY
